data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea abies (Norway spruce) from sample NOVACI-121

Exposition W, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Granit, Podsol, Tree line 1700 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 5%, Moss cover 50%, Vegatation type: Campanulo abietinae-Piceion, Film number: 657A
